channel.title: Else without if {PI} [Lock Plz]

item.title: Else without if {PI} [Lock Plz]
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

Ok so im trying to make a portal teleport you depending on a character token. The problem is, is that when I compile it, it says else without if and I’m not sure on how to correct this code so please help, It would be highly appreciated. BTW i’m using a PI base and the code is below.

case 13628:
if(c.jteam < 1 || c.lastsummon < -1 || c.summoningnpcid < 0); {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4973, 0);
} else { if(c.pteam < 1 || c.lastsummon < -1 || c.summoningnpcid < 0); {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4974, 0);
} else { if(c.ateam < 1 || c.lastsummon < -1 || c.summoningnpcid < 0); {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4975, 0);
} else { if(c.bteam < 1 || c.lastsummon < -1 || c.summoningnpcid < 0); {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4976, 0);
break;

Ok well thanks to no one but if someone needs help on a project like this here’s the working code.

case 13628:
if(c.jteam == 1 && c.lastsummon == -1 && c.summoningnpcid == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4973, 0);
}
if (c.pteam == 1 && c.lastsummon == -1 && c.summoningnpcid == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4974, 0);
}
if (c.ateam == 1 && c.lastsummon == -1 && c.summoningnpcid == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4975, 0);
}
if (c.bteam == 1 && c.lastsummon == -1 && c.summoningnpcid == 0) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3044, 4976, 0);
}
break;

Read full topic
